servers.insert: INSERT INTO servers (server_ip, server_dns, active, time_stamp) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s) RETURNING server_id
servers.update: UPDATE servers SET server_ip=%s, server_dns=%s, active=%s WHERE server_id=%s

customers.insert: INSERT INTO customers (username, password, active, time_stamp) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s) RETURNING customer_id
customers.update: UPDATE customers SET username=%s, password=%s, active=%s WHERE customer_id=%s

blacklist.insert: INSERT INTO blacklist (ip, server_id, time_stamp) VALUES (%s, %s, %s) RETURNING id
blacklist.update: UPDATE blacklist SET ip=%s, server_id=%s WHERE id=%s

whitelist.insert: INSERT INTO whitelist (ip, server_id, time_stamp) VALUES (%s, %s, %s) RETURNING id
whitelist.update: UPDATE whitelist SET ip=%s, server_id=%s WHERE id=%s

http_responses.insert: INSERT INTO http_responses (request_id, method, content, from_server_id, to_ip, decision, time_stamp) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s) RETURNING response_id
http_responses.update: UPDATE http_responses SET request_id=%s, method=%s, content=%s, from_server_id=%s, to_ip=%s, decision=%s WHERE response_id=%s

http_requests.insert: INSERT INTO http_requests (response_id, method, content, from_ip, to_server_id, decision, time_stamp) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s) RETURNING request_id
http_requests.update: UPDATE http_requests SET response_id=%s, method=%s, content=%s, from_ip=%s, to_server_id=%s, decision=%s WHERE request_id=%s

detectors_requests_data.insert: INSERT INTO detectors_requests_data (request_id, bruteforce, bots, cookie_poisoning, csrf, ddos, sql_injection, xml_injection, xss_injection) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s) RETURNING id
detectors_requests_data.update: UPDATE detectors_requests_data SET request_id=%s, bruteforce=%s, bots=%s, cookie_poisoning=%s, csrf=%s, ddos=%s, sql_injection=%s, xml_injection=%s, xss_injection=%s WHERE id=%s

ml_requests_data.insert: INSERT INTO ml_requests_data (request_id, bruteforce, bots, cookie_poisoning, csrf, ddos, sql_injection, xml_injection, xss_injection) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s) RETURNING id
ml_requests_data.update: UPDATE ml_requests_data SET request_id=%s, bruteforce=%s, bots=%s, cookie_poisoning=%s, csrf=%s, ddos=%s, sql_injection=%s, xml_injection=%s, xss_injection=%s WHERE id=%s

detectors_data_responses.insert: INSERT INTO detectors_data_responses (response_id, user_protection, xss_injection) VALUES (%s, %s, %s) RETURNING id
detectors_data_responses.update: UPDATE detectors_data_responses SET response_id=%s, user_protection=%s, xss_injection=%s WHERE id=%s

ml_data_responses.insert: INSERT INTO ml_data_responses (response_id, user_protection, xss_injection) VALUES (%s, %s, %s) RETURNING id
ml_data_responses.update: UPDATE ml_data_responses SET response_id=%s, user_protection=%s, xss_injection=%s WHERE id=%s
